description.narrative: By 2025, families and communities demonstrate strengthened capacity and commitment to protect children and women from violence, exploitation and harmful practices., which contributes to Harmful Practices (Fgm/C And Child Marriage). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, children are safer and better protected from violence, abuse, exploitation and harm.
